forum.name: T1D2 Discussion: Assessment to Support Student Learning
forum.intro:
Responses to Fair Assessment Practices by Linda Suskie

Based on your reading, please post your responses to the following questions:

  • What is one thing you learned from this article that you would like to apply to your practice?
  • What questions or concerns does this article raise for you?
  • How does the article support your current assessment or instructional practices?

After you post, please take time to review others posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Note: This item will automatically mark itself complete on the main course outline once you have submitted a post.

Reminder: To Post to Discussions:

  1. Click on "Add a new discussion topic.”
  2. Type your message subject.
  3. Type your message information. 
  4. Click on the "Post to Forum" button.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on the Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
